name: SellingSolutions Scandinavia AB
description: Developer of a cloud-based application designed for construction management. The company designs and develops a mobile application for construction collaboration and documentation, it helps to replace paper reports with a mobile app at construction sites, enabling site personnel to create and share all project documentation created during production.
